title: Monthly observations for the preserving of health with a long and comfortable life, in this our pilgrimage on earth; but more particularly for the spring and summer seasons. By Phylotheus Phystologus. With allowance.
author: Tryon, Thomas, 1634-1703.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed, and sold, by Andrew Sowle, at the Three Keys in Nogs Head-Court in Grace-Church Street, over-against the Conduit,
